TopicTitle: Fairing activation through staging create troubles

Articles.Content:
Greetings, 

I have a nice bug that prevent me from using the latest design I made to ferry kerbals around kerbin SOI, it's maiden flight went well and the ship return from the mun with d/v to spare, so I decided to launch the same vessel for Minmus, but troubles happened !

At launch, everything's fine but the prograde vector who shake for no reason (???) (it shake without SAS as well)

booster stage drop, still fine, and prograde vector stopped shaking

first stage drop, mainsail correctly fire, nothing wrong

second stage drop, but injection stage won't start (by staging, can still activate manually) and the game seem to consider i'm landed at this point... (???) all the vectors on the navball seem to shake, the vessel is shaky as well

I can still fly the spacecraft, but it's trajectory disappear on the map view

here some pics to show the sciences report while at 67 000m above sea level

EDIT : I just did a few try with the exact same vessel, BUT, without the fairing... And it seemed the fairing to be the cause, will try different shots

EDIT 2 : Yep, once the fairing is activated through staging, everything goes wrong

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/lqagd)

Mod list : 

ActiveTextureManagement

ExtraplanetaryLaunchpads

KAS - KIS

KerbalEngineer

KerbalJointReinforcement

Kerbokatz

NoMoreGrind

ScienceAlert

SmartParts

StageRecovery

TacFuelBalance

KerbalAlarmClock
